Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsServerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsServerConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WlsDynamicServerConfig

    public class WlsServerConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains configuration of a WebLogic server

    • Constructor Detail

      • WlsServerConfig

        public WlsServerConfig​(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.Integer listenPort,
                       java.lang.String listenAddress,
                       java.lang.Integer sslListenPort,
                       boolean sslPortEnabled,
                       java.lang.String machineName,
                       java.util.List<NetworkAccessPoint> networkAccessPoints)
        Construct a WlsServerConfig object using values provided
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the WLS server
        listenPort - Configured listen port for this WLS server
        listenAddress - Configured listen address for this WLS server
        sslListenPort - Configured SSL listen port for this WLS server
        sslPortEnabled - boolean indicating whether the SSL listen port should be enabled
        machineName - Configured machine name for this WLS server
        networkAccessPoints - List of NetworkAccessPoint containing channels configured for this WLS server

        public boolean isSslPortEnabled​()
        Return whether the SSL listen port is configured to be enabled or not
        Returns:
        True if the SSL listen port should be enabled, false otherwise

      • getMachineName

      • getNetworkAccessPoints

        public java.util.List<NetworkAccessPoint> getNetworkAccessPoints​()
        Returns an array containing all network access points configured in this WLS server
        Returns:
        An array of NetworkAccessPoint containing configured network access points in this WLS server. If there are no network access points configured in this server, an empty array is returned.

      • isDynamicServer

        public boolean isDynamicServer​()
        Whether this server is a dynamic server, ie, not statically configured
        Returns:
        True if this server is a dynamic server, false if this server is configured statically
